Name: The Grim Nightmare of Nibras
About the game: The Grim Nightmare of Nibras is a story told through various dark and strange locations. Each scene is a part of the plot telling its own dark story. In most scenes, the player will be able to find references to popular locations or special popular elements from video games and movies. The scenes are reproduced in minimalism style in 3D and transferred to a movie-game format. Features of the game: Atmospheric locations; Dark music; Search for objects; A story told through locations. The Grim Nightmare of Nibras is a story with the search for objects in gloomy locations.
